title: “Church of Bleach” family guilty on all counts, plans to appeal
description: The family, who represented themselves, did not speak during the trial.

title: DART asteroid impact created a 10,000-kilometer debris field of boulders
description: The asteroid-smashing planetary defense mission knocked some large rocks free.

title: Musk subpoenas Elizabeth Warren days after she called for Tesla investigation
description: Warren urged SEC to examine Musk's actions while running Twitter and Tesla.

title: Report: Apple has already built its own ChatGPT-like chatbot
description: The tool is being used internally by employees—with some major restrictions.

title: Millions of servers inside data centers imperiled by flaws in AMI BMC firmware
description: BMCs give near-total control over entire fleets of servers. What happens when they're hacked?

title: Dealmaster: Apple gear, Lenovo laptops, and more
description: We found discounts on laptops, board games, and back-to-school equipment.

title: This white dwarf star has two “faces”
description: One side is all helium, and the other side is all hydrogen, baffling astronomers.

title: Microsoft to stop locking vital security logs behind $57-per-user monthly plan
description: US agency urged Microsoft to expand access to logs that can identify cyberattacks.

title: Jagged Alliance 3 has smart tactics, goofy characters, stupid fun escapism
description: 24 years later, it's still fun to micromanage your ragtag soldiers of fortune.

title: Outlook for Windows app replaces Mail and Calendar in new Windows 11 preview
description: Outlook for Windows client is still a preview with some missing features.

title: Someone new will join the US military’s roster of launch contractors
description: Will Jeff Bezos's Blue Origin finally join the ranks of ULA and SpaceX?

title: TSMC delays US chip fab opening, says US talent is insufficient
description: Arizona chip factory won't be operational until 2025, TSMC said.

title: Google demos “unsettling” tool to help journalists write the news
description: "Genesis" will seek to assist journalists, not replace them—yet.

title: Google’s latest price hike is for YouTube Premium, now $13.99 per month
description: Move follows price increases to Family Plans, YouTube TV, Workspace, and Cloud.

title: Once again, the US public says NASA should prioritize asteroid defense
description: Just 7 percent of US women want NASA to prioritize humans to Mars.

title: Tesla revenue grows to $25 billion, but margin shrinks in Q2 2023
description: CEO Elon Musk claims another automaker may license the controversial FSD system.

title: Meta tells news publishers to talk to the hand
description: Growing rift with publishers has Meta downgrading news on Threads, Facebook.
